sentence: RELATED STORIES Attorney General Josh Shapiro Says He Lacks Power To Investigate Price Gouging At The Pump Small Business Owners Absorbing Cost Of Rising Gas Prices For Now Spike In Gas Prices Making It Harder For Delivery And Rideshare Services As Gas Prices Soar, Pittsburghers Looking Into Alternative Forms Of Transportation #PicturesFromThePump: Share a pic here of the price you paid for gas >> https://cbsloc.al/3IPfAsu Posted by KDKA-TV | CBS Pittsburgh on Tuesday, March 8, 2022 In: Gas Prices Inflation

sentence: By: Patrick Damp and Andy Sheehan/KDKA-TV HARRISBURG (KDKA) - A coordinated effort between local police and the office of Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro ended with an arrest and a seizure of over $1 million in fentanyl in Braddock.
title: AG Josh Shapiro's Office Announces Seizure Of Fentanyl And Guns In Braddock

sentence: By: KDKA-TV News Staff HARRISBURG (KDKA) -- Ahead of the April 18 tax deadline, Attorney General Josh Shapiro is warning taxpayers to be wary about potential scams.
title: Attorney General Josh Shapiro Warns About IRS Tax Day Scams
